news_header: Donald Trump plans to sign a record number of orders upon returning to office, including reversing Biden's decisions and mass deportation of undocumented immigrants.
news_text: Donald Trump, returning to office on Monday, intends to sign a record number of orders immediately. He claims there are a hundred orders to execute, including reversing decisions made by President Joe Biden. Additionally, mass deportation of undocumented immigrants is on his agenda for the first week. Trump arrived in Washington on Saturday night ahead of his inauguration.
